co.cask.coopr.cluster

Class ClusterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.cluster.ClusterService

  • public class ClusterService
extends Object
    Service for performing operations on clusters.

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterSummaries

        public List<ClusterSummary> getClusterSummaries(Account account,
                                       Set<Cluster.Status> states)
                                         throws IOException
        Get a list of summaries of all clusters visible to the given account that are in one of the given states.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to get cluster summaries for.
        states - Returned clusters must be in one of these states.
        Returns:
        List of summaries of all clusters visible to the given account.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an exception reading the cluster data from the store.

      • requestClusterCreate

        public String requestClusterCreate(ClusterCreateRequest clusterCreateRequest,
                          Account account)
                            throws IOException,
                                   QuotaException,
                                   MissingEntityException,
                                   InvalidClusterException,
                                   IllegalAccessException,
                                   MissingFieldsException
        Submit a request to create a cluster, creating a placeholder cluster object and adding a task to solve for a layout to the solver queue.
        Parameters:
        clusterCreateRequest - Request to create a cluster.
        account - Account of the user making the request.
        Returns:
        Id of the cluster that will be created.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some error writing to stores.
        QuotaException - if the operation would cause the tenant quotas to be exceeded.
        MissingEntityException - if some required entity such as the provider or template does not exist.
        InvalidClusterException - if the requested cluster violates the template constraints.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.
        MissingFieldsException - if there are required fields missing from the request.

      • requestClusterDelete

        public void requestClusterDelete(String clusterId,
                        Account account,
                        ClusterOperationRequest request)
                          throws IOException,
                                 IllegalAccessException,
                                 MissingEntityException,
                                 MissingFieldsException
        Request deletion of a given cluster that the user has permission to delete.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of the cluster to delete.
        account - Account of the user making the request.
        request - Request to delete the cluster, containing optional provider fields.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some error writing to stores.
        MissingEntityException - if some entity required to complete, such as the provider type used to create the cluster, could not be found.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.
        MissingFieldsException - if there are required fields missing from the request.

      • requestClusterReconfigure

        public void requestClusterReconfigure(String clusterId,
                             Account account,
                             ClusterConfigureRequest request)
                               throws IOException,
                                      MissingEntityException,
                                      IllegalAccessException,
                                      MissingFieldsException
        Put in a request to reconfigure services on an active cluster. Throws a MissingClusterException if no cluster owned by the user is found and an IllegalStateException if the cluster is not in a state where the action can be performed.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of cluster to reconfigure.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to reconfigure the cluster.
        request - Request to configure the cluster, containing the new config plus other options.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was so error writing to stores.
        MissingEntityException - if some entity required to complete, such as the cluster or the provider type used to create the cluster, could not be found.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.
        MissingFieldsException - if there are required fields missing from the request.

      • requestServiceRuntimeAction

        public void requestServiceRuntimeAction(String clusterId,
                               Account account,
                               ClusterAction action,
                               String service,
                               ClusterOperationRequest request)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        MissingEntityException,
                                        IllegalAccessException,
                                        MissingFieldsException
        Put in a request to perform an action on a specific service on an active cluster, or on all cluster services. Throws a MissingClusterException if no cluster owned by the user is found and an IllegalStateException if the cluster is not in a state where the action can be performed.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of cluster perform the service action on.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to perform an action on the cluster service.
        action - Action to perform on the service.
        service - Service to perform the action on. Null means perform the action on all services.
        request - Service action request, containing optional provider fields.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was so error writing to stores.
        MissingEntityException - if some entity required to complete, such as the cluster or the provider type used to create the cluster, could not be found.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.
        MissingFieldsException - if there are required fields missing from the request.

      • requestAbortJob

        public void requestAbortJob(String clusterId,
                   Account account)
                     throws IOException,
                            MissingClusterException
        Throws:
        IOException
        MissingClusterException

      • requestPauseJob

        public void requestPauseJob(String clusterId,
                   Account account)
                     throws IOException,
                            MissingClusterException
        Request to pause a cluster job that is currently running.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of the cluster.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to pause a cluster job.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some error writing to stores.
        MissingClusterException - if no cluster owned by the user is found.

      • requestResumeJob

        public void requestResumeJob(String clusterId,
                    Account account)
                      throws IOException,
                             MissingClusterException
        Request to resume a cluster job that was previously paused.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of the cluster.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to resume a cluster job.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some error writing to stores.
        MissingClusterException - if no cluster owned by the user is found.

      • requestAddServices

        public void requestAddServices(String clusterId,
                      Account account,
                      AddServicesRequest addRequest)
                        throws IOException,
                               MissingEntityException,
                               IllegalAccessException,
                               MissingFieldsException
        Put in a request to add services to an active cluster. Throws a MissingClusterException if no cluster owned by the user is found and an IllegalStateException if the cluster is not in a state where the action can be performed.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of cluster to add services to.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to add services to the cluster.
        addRequest - Request to add services.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some problem writing to stores.
        MissingEntityException - if some entity required to complete, such as the cluster or the provider type used to create the cluster, could not be found.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.
        MissingFieldsException - if there are required fields missing from the request.

      • syncClusterToCurrentTemplate

        public void syncClusterToCurrentTemplate(String clusterId,
                                Account account)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         MissingEntityException,
                                         InvalidClusterException,
                                         IllegalAccessException
        Sync the template of the cluster to the current version of the template. Throws a MissingClusterException if no cluster owned by the user is found, an IllegalStateException if the cluster is not in a state where it can by synced, or a MissingEntityException if the template no longer exists.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - Id of the cluster to sync.
        account - Account of the user trying to sync the cluster.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some problem writing to stores.
        MissingEntityException - if there is no cluster with the given id, or if the template no longer exists.
        InvalidClusterException - if syncing the template would result in an invalid cluster.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.

      • changeExpireTime

        public void changeExpireTime(String clusterId,
                    Account account,
                    long expireTime)
                      throws IOException,
                             IllegalAccessException,
                             MissingClusterException
        Changes expire time of a cluster. The new expire time has to be greater than the cluster create time, and the increment requested should be less than the step size, and new expire time should not be greater than the max duration defined in the template.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - cluster Id.
        account - account of the user requesting the change.
        expireTime - new expire time.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some problem writing to stores.
        IllegalAccessException - if the operation is not allowed for the given account.
        MissingClusterException

      • resolveTemplate

        public ClusterTemplate resolveTemplate(Account account,
                              ClusterTemplate clusterTemplate)
                                throws TemplateNotFoundException,
                                       TemplateImmutabilityException,
                                       IOException,
                                       TemplateValidationException
        Build cluster template from provided includes and parents.
        Parameters:
        clusterTemplate - Cluster template which can contains includes and parents.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to resolve a cluster template.
        Returns:
        Cluster Template with merged body from includes and parents.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some error writing to stores.
        TemplateNotFoundException - if template is unknown type.
        TemplateImmutabilityException - if some template tries to override immutable template config.
        TemplateValidationException - if template after merge does not has some required fields.

      • resolveTemplate

        public ClusterTemplate resolveTemplate(Account account,
                              String templateName)
                                throws IOException,
                                       TemplateNotFoundException,
                                       TemplateImmutabilityException,
                                       TemplateValidationException
        Build cluster template from provided includes and parents.
        Parameters:
        templateName - Cluster template name.
        account - Account of the user that is trying to resolve a cluster template.
        Returns:
        Cluster Template with merged body from includes and parents.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was some error reading from stores.
        TemplateNotFoundException - if template can't be found in store.
        TemplateImmutabilityException - if some template tries to override immutable template config.
        TemplateValidationException - if template after merge does not has some required fields.
